THE JEFFERS GNIAN HERITAGE
Fact Sheet
Pressings of the 13 half-hour radio dramas are available
to all radio stations a
None will be sold on an exclusive baBis.
Series must be carried on a sustaining basis. No sponsorship
will be permitted*
The pressings will be shipped to stations ordering the
series on or about November 1. A more definite date will
be indicated by NAEB no later than October 100
The cost per set of pressings is $25Â« The charge includes
shipping direct from the manufacturer to the stations
ordering.
Limited promotional material will be made availaole* See
leaflet enclosed.
NAEB cannot guarantee delivery for orders received after
October 10.
Audition discs are currently not available.
Send check or write for further informations
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Frank Schooley, Treasurer
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
